action.action-desc: Mr. Coffman (for himself and Ms. Brownley of California) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to ensure that children of homeless veterans are included in the calculation of the amounts of certain per diem grants.

section.header: Modification of calculation of amounts of per diem grants
section.text: Section 2012(a)(2)(B) of title 38, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in clause (i), by inserting or (iii) after clause (ii); and
by adding at the end the following new clause:

clause.text: With respect to a homeless veteran who has care of a minor dependent while receiving services from the grant recipient or eligible entity, the daily cost of care shall be the sum of the daily cost of care determined under subparagraph (A) plus, for each such minor dependent, an amount that equals 50 percent of such daily cost of care.
